snippet.title: Magic Soldier - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
✨ Magic Soldier is a 2D pixel art open-world MMORPG where magic and combat collide. Explore a vast world filled with dangerous monsters, hidden secrets, and powerful loot. Customize your character, master unique spells, and battle alongside friends or rivals in real-time multiplayer action.

Steam link : https://store.steampowered.com/app/3488490/?snr=1_5_9__205
